abstract: Boeing expects to decide by the end of the year whether to revamp its popular 737 jet or to develop a new aircraft.
snippet: Boeing expects to decide by the end of the year whether to revamp its popular 737 jet or to develop a new aircraft.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Boeing will decide this year whether to revamp its popular 737 jet with more fuel-efficient engines or to develop a new single-aisle jet, an executive of the company said on Sunday.

headline.main: Boeing to Decide This Year Whether to Revamp or Replace 737 Jet
headline.print_headline: Boeing to Decide This Year Whether to Revamp or Replace 737 Jet
